issue.title: Indoor navigation & resource vizualisation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

As map allows indoor navigation, it would be interesting to add this capacity to the resource vizualisation.

Currently, a resource vizualisation is just a layer without indoor navigation ability. 
By extending this layer with indoor navigation informations, the map used to display resource vizualisation would be able to render it in an indoor context with navigation available.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC OK.
